entities.name: reg cattermole
entities.description: Reg Cattermole is mentioned on a label in the back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is under the Invisibility Cloak and has to wait for Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron reappears with Hermione after waiting for ten minutes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who tells Harry to wait and later returns with Ron.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher laundered old robes for Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry has to wait for Hermione.
Ron returns with Hermione after waiting for ten minutes.
